panels.description:
### Query wall time
Seconds per second spent by queriers evaluating queries.
This is roughly the product of the number of subqueries for a query and how long they took.
In increase in this metric means that queries take more resources from the query path to evaluate.

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.99, {cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",name=~"$component.*"} |= "query stats" != "/api/v1/read" | logfmt | user=~"${tenant_id}" | user_agent=~"${user_agent}" | response_time > ${min_duration} | unwrap query_wall_time_seconds [$__auto]) by ()

quantile_over_time(0.5, {cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",name=~"$component.*"} |= "query stats" != "/api/v1/read" | logfmt | user=~"${tenant_id}" | user_agent=~"${user_agent}" | response_time > ${min_duration} | unwrap query_wall_time_seconds [$__auto]) by ()

panels.title: Query wall time

targets.expr: topk(10, quantile_over_time(0.99, {cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",name=~"$component.*"} |= "query stats" != "/api/v1/read" | logfmt | user=~"${tenant_id}" | user_agent=~"${user_agent}" | response_time > ${min_duration} | unwrap duration_seconds(response_time) [$__auto]) by (user))
